channel.title: Festa do Software Livre 2025
channel.description: Recent content on Festa do Software Livre 2025

item.title: Call for proposals
item.description: Important dates Talks and Workshops proposals Proposal submission period: 2025-05-01T00:00:00+01:00 ~ 2022-07-31T23:59:59+01:00 Proposal review period: 2025-08-01 ~ 2025-08-15 Notification of acceptance and speaker confirmation: 2025-08-07 ~ 2025-08-21 Lighting talks and BoFs Lightning talk: Submit until friday midnight (KST) Submit or edit proposal Make sure to read guidelines below before submitting proposal Proposal help on chat or email If you want to submit your proposal, But you might be not sure wheather your topics is proper choice for this conference.
